H0.text: who was the leader of the zulu in south africa who led the fight against the british. Shaka

H1.text: who was the leader of the zulu in south africa who led the fight against the british. Dingane

H2.text: who was the leader of the zulu in south africa who led the fight against the british. Mpande

H3.text: who was the leader of the zulu in south africa who led the fight against the british. Cetshwayo

A4.text: The Anglo-Zulu War was fought under King Cetshwayo of the Zulu Kingdom.

A5.text: By the 1830s migrating Boers came into conflict with the Zulu Kingdom, then ruled by Dingane.
